title: 龙之研究如何禁止反应堆的爆炸~
author: XueRe
txt_content: 如题怎样禁止反应堆爆炸，或者插件也行

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
1.12.2
修改服务端目录下的config\brandon3055\DraconicEvolution.cfg

找到  # If true will disable the massive reactor explosion and replace it with a much smaller one.
    B:disableLargeReactorBoom=true


同时建议改这个禁止混沌岛爆炸：
    # If true will disable the destruction of chaos islands after the chaos crystal is broken.
    B:disableChaosIslandExplosion=true


true为阻止爆炸

1.7.10
修改服务端目录下的config\DraconicEvolution.cfg

找到
    # Setting this to false will reduce the reactor explosion to little more then a tnt blast
    B:EnableBigExplosion=false

false代表阻止反应堆大爆炸

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
